original_title: Fragments D'un Sejour En Chine Fragmente Einer Reise Nach China
overview: A video diary, filmed almost 20 years ago, through the gaze of the very young European girl I was at that time, a gaze that doesn't exist anymore â€“ just as this strange world on the edge to vanish.
title: Fragments D'un Sejour En Chine Fragmente Einer Reise Nach China
